document.full_text: consumers should double-check infant bed-side sleepers which, if not installed properly, pose entrapment, suffocation and fall risks, the government said on tuesday.
document.title: bed-side sleepers may pose hazards for infants
lines_and_colors: consumers should double-check infant bed-side sleepers which, if not installed properly, pose entrapment, suffocation and fall risks, the government said on tuesday.
